alert.note: Alert for Columbus (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Columbus County through 345 PM EDT... At 259 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Williams, or near Whiteville, slowly moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Whiteville, Tabor City, Chadbourn, Williams, Old Dock, Mollie, Sidney, Crusoe Island, Southeastern Community College, Clarendon, Brunswick and Columbus Regional Healthcare System. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
